column2: A private field where all assignments occur as part of the declaration or in a constructor in the same class can be 'readonly'.
Catching all exceptions with a generic catch clause may be overly broad, which can make errors harder to diagnose.
A message emitted by the compiler, including warnings and errors.
column4: Warning CS0414 The field 'CWE667_Improper_Locking__basic_01.intBadNumber' is assigned but its value is never used

column1: Static field written by instance method
column2: Finds instance methods that write static fields. This is tricky to get right if multiple instances are being manipulated, and generally bad practice.
column4: Write to static field from instance method or constructor.
